page.title: Java Basics: Practical Guide to Beans and POJOs

content.explanation:
- what is a bean today? - what are POJOs? - history of beans: beans are not GUI components anymore - explain properties: getter/setter mechanisms - explain bean reflection - explain apache commons / beanutils - dependency injection - beans in spring and similar containers - beans and multithreading (don't!)
Beans with annotations: - EJBs (3.x) - JPA - JSF backing bean?
Older beans: - EJBs (1.x/2.x) - Swing GUI beans

subSection.head: Requirements
subSection.explanation: Java supports the assert statement since version 1.4 (in other words, practically forever).
